string.text: DUTY TERRITORY
Gain the locals' trust

To see Duty's superiors, as well as their trader and technician, I need to gain the trust of the local stalkers. From there, there will be more opportunities for work and additional equipment. To start with, Sergeant Plichko advised me to work for Barkeep.
Talk to Sergeant Plichko
I think I've found my place in the Bar and that Sergeant Plichko will let me into Duty territory. They might offer me some work.
BANDIT MAZE
Meet the stalkers
A stalker in the Bar asked me to help rescue his friends that ended up in bandit captivity at the Garbage. I should meet with another couple of stalkers to arrange an attack.
BLACKOUT
Find out what happened
I vaguely remember getting shot... and then ending up here. I should find out where I am.
Talk to the Duty fighters
Barkeep told me that I was saved from the bandits by Duty. I should talk to the fighters and find out whether they need anything.
UNUSUAL REQUEST
See Korvalol for the sergeant's present
Sergeant Lyubeznov asked me to head off to the Garbage to see our mutual acquaintance and grab his present.
Bring the dog tag and artifact to the sergeant
Korvalol passed on the lost dog tag, plus an artifact, to Sergeant Lyubeznov. I should bring them to the Duty fighter.
LOOT
Reach the bandit stash
Sergeant Lyubeznov gave me the key to a bandit stash at the Garbage. The bandits themselves nearly did me in during my first visit to the Bar. Still, it might contain something useful.
Search the bandit stash
I managed to enter the room with the stash. I should examine everything here real good - might find something useful.
PERSONAL BELONGINGS
Take things from the box
Barkeep stored all my belongings in a box in his room. I should to take them.
ALONG THE WAY
Respond to the call for help
Stalkers on the way to the Bar are asking for help. How did they even get that far with such equipment?
Deal with the psy-dogs
The stalker group is unable to get through to the Bar because of a pack of psy-dogs. I should clean the road - primarily for my own sake.
ESCAPE
Find the exit
I wound up behind bars in the Bar... I need to find a way out, pronto.
Talk to Koval
A pleasant surprise! Koval may be my ticket to freedom.
Follow Koval
Koval came to my aid at just the right time. The colonel was right about his level of experience for an ordinary stalker. In this case, he helped out a lot.
Turn off the lights at the Duty checkpoint
To slip past the patrols, I need to shut the lights. Flipping the switch in the adjacent building should do the trick.
Hide from the patrols and wait for the right moment
I shut off the checkpoint lights. Now I need to wait for an opportunty to slip past the patrols.
Flee Duty territory
I failed to pass the Duty soldiers. I need to break out of here ASAP.
Break out of the Bar alone
Now I'm the only one who can get myself out of this mess.
PLAYING WITH FIRE
Kill the fire poltergeists

Gena Hollow, a stalker from the Bar, told me about poltergeists made out of fire that burned his squad members alive. He asked me to deal with them in case I find myself heading to the Army Warehouses.
Return to collect reward
The fire poltergeists won't be troubling the Bar's visitors anymore. Time to see Gena for my reward.
BOOZY'S STASH
Reach the stash
Sanya Bottleman told me about the stash of stalker Boozy. The stash is apparently filled with vodka and rare artifacts. I should try my luck and check the place he spoke of.
Find out what happened
Looks like I went into an idiot trap, and boy, did they strip me down! Sanya Bottleman was also there. I need to ask him a few questions.
Decide Sanya Bottleman's fate
Sanya set me up, lured me into a trap, and is now writhing in pain and asking for help. Should I give him a medkit or leave the freak to the rats?
HERO OR EXECUTIONER?
Find Goose
I need to find Goose and talk him out of participating in the arena battles. There must be another way out for him. Barkeep probably knows something.
Ask Chrome about Cobra
I don't give a damn what Chrome says about this Cobra. I need do something about that bastard. First I'll find out where to find him.
Talk to Cobra
I need to make a deal with Cobra - and carefully. This won't be simple.
Follow Chrome
Chrome is eager to put an end to Cobra, but something doesn't add up. What is Chrome's motive? For now, I need to follow him and then see.
Talk to Arnie
Because of what I had gotten myself into with Cobra, I forgot about Goose and his upcoming fight in the arena. I need to find out if he's okay.
Read Goose's note
Goose left me a note before he died. I should read it to find out any details.
Talk to Chrome
It turns out that Chrome deceived me. Almost everything he said about Cobra was a lie. But why? I need to ask him.
Pick up gear at Cobra's

Things didn't turn out so bad, but I had a reason to worry. Chrome seems to be telling the truth, but I still don't fully believe him. He left something out. He said himself that strangers don't deserve your trust. Now I need to pick up my gear and make a move on Cobra.
Meet with Chrome
I need to meet with Chrome by the southern Bar checkpoint. Does Cobra really deserve to die? Nothing is clear at the moment.
Kill the stalkers and talk to Cobra
I have no business with Cobra's henchmen, but with Cobra himself... I'd like to know his point of view in his rivalry with Chrome.
Talk to Chrome
Looks like it's all over. Time to talk to Chrome
